page.title: 19A CITIZEN
page.content: His day starts at 5.00 a.m. with a mall breakfast. He then walks to work at about 6.00 a.m. He works at Unipart as a fork-lift-truck driver lifting up pallets of batteries, spark- plugs, radios, paint, gearboxes, fan-belts, oil filters, seat-covers etc. He has lunch at about l2.30. The lunch-break ends at l.00 p.m. He finishes work at 4.00 p.m., but some times works overtime for anything up to two hours. When he comes home he has a cup of tea and something to eat. Then he usually works in the garden mowing the lawn or weeding or planting some flowers. Sometimes he works in the greenhouse. When he comes in he usually watches television. The news is normally on which he enjoys and he watches the weather forecast to see what the weather will be like on the next day. Then he goes to bed.
